016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.model.Plugin;
020import org.apache.maven.model.PluginExecution;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.DefaultInvocationRequest;
025import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationRequest;
026import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.Invoker;
028import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
029import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
030import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
031
032import javax.inject.Inject;
033import javax.inject.Singleton;
034import java.util.Collections;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference;
037
038import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.*;
039
040/**
041 * Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
042 *
043 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
044 * @since 1.1
045 */
046@Singleton
047public class ExecutorService {
048
049    private final MojoExecutor.ExecutionEnvironment executionEnvironment;
050    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
051    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
052    private final Invoker invoker;
053
054    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
055    @Inject
056    public ExecutorService(MavenProject mavenProject, MavenSession mavenSession, BuildPluginManager pluginManager,
057                           Invoker invoker) {
058        this.executionEnvironment = executionEnvironment(mavenProject, mavenSession, pluginManager);
059        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
060        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
061        this.invoker = invoker;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Executes the given goal from the given plugin coordinates.
066     *
067     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId:version
068     * @param goal The goal to execute
069     * @throws MojoExecutionException If the goal execution fails
070     */
071    public void executeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MojoExecutionException {
072        final Plugin plugin = mavenProject.getPlugin(pluginKey);
073        if (plugin != null) {
074            AtomicReference<String> executionId = new AtomicReference<>(goal);
075            if (goal != null && goal.indexOf('#') > -1) {
076                int pos = goal.indexOf('#');
077                executionId.set(goal.substring(pos + 1));
078                goal = goal.substring(0, pos);
079            }
080            Optional<PluginExecution> execution = plugin
081                    .getExecutions()
082                    .stream()
083                    .filter(e -> e.getId().equals(executionId.get()))
084                    .findFirst();
085            Xpp3Dom configuration;
086            if (execution.isPresent()) {
087                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) execution.get().getConfiguration();
088            } else if (plugin.getConfiguration() != null) {
089                configuration = (Xpp3Dom) plugin.getConfiguration();
090            } else {
091                configuration = configuration();
092            }
093            executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
094        } else {
095            throw new MojoExecutionException("Plugin not found: " + pluginKey);
096        }
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Executes a goal using the given arguments.
101     *
102     * @param pluginGroup plugin group id
103     * @param pluginArtifact plugin artifact id
104     * @param pluginVersion plugin version
105     * @param goal goal to execute
106     * @param configuration configuration for the goal
107     * @throws MojoExecutionException if the goal execution fails
108     */
109    public void executeGoal(String pluginGroup, String pluginArtifact, String pluginVersion, String goal, Xpp3Dom configuration) throws MojoExecutionException {
110        final Plugin plugin = plugin(pluginGroup, pluginArtifact, pluginVersion);
111        executeMojo(plugin, goal(goal), configuration, executionEnvironment);
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Executes a goal using the Maven shared invoker.
116     * @param pluginKey The plugin coordinates in the format groupId:artifactId
117     * @param goal The goal to execute
118     * @return The result of the invocation
119     * @throws MavenInvocationException If the goal execution fails
120     */
121    public InvocationResult invokeGoal(String pluginKey, String goal) throws MavenInvocationException {
122        InvocationRequest request = new DefaultInvocationRequest();
123        request.setPomFile(mavenProject.getFile());
124        request.setUserSettingsFile(mavenSession.getRequest().getUserSettingsFile());
125        request.setGoals(Collections.singletonList(pluginKey + ":" + goal));
126        request.setBatchMode(true);
127        request.setQuiet(true);
128        return invoker.execute(request);
129    }
130}
